metadata.job_title: Sr. Data Engineer(hands on Palantir exp.)

seniority_level.evidence: Title contains 'Sr.' and requires 8-10 years of experience, which aligns with senior level expectations

job_family.evidence: Title explicitly states 'Data Engineer' and job focuses on data pipeline development and implementation

sub_specialty.evidence: Palantir Foundry experience with Hadoop ecosystem (Hive, PySpark) suggests general data engineering rather than specialized streaming or ML focus

leadership_expectation.evidence: Emphasis on 'hands-on experience' and technical implementation without mention of team leadership or mentoring responsibilities

primary_cloud.evidence: Hadoop-based technologies (Hive, PySpark) mentioned without cloud providers, suggesting on-premise Hadoop cluster environment

secondary_clouds.evidence: No cloud providers mentioned in job description or requirements

processing_paradigm.evidence: Hadoop/Hive/PySpark stack typically used for batch processing data pipelines rather than real-time streaming

orchestrator_category.evidence: No workflow orchestration tools mentioned in job description

storage_layer.evidence: Hadoop ecosystem with Hive suggests data lake architecture using HDFS for storage

remote_restriction.evidence: Specifically states 'locals only for onsite' indicating Atlanta, GA area residents required

timezone_focus.evidence: Atlanta, GA location suggests EST timezone, part of Americas timezone region

relocation_required.evidence: Looking for locals only implies candidates must already be in Atlanta area or willing to relocate there

h1b_friendly.evidence: No visa sponsorship mentioned and requirement for locals only suggests no visa sponsorship available

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: Looking for locals only and no mention of student visa support suggests OPT/CPT not accepted

citizenship_required.evidence: No explicit citizenship requirement mentioned, but locals only requirement suggests work authorization in US required

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Employment type stated as contract but specific contract structure (W2/1099/C2C) not mentioned

benefits_level.evidence: No benefits, equity, PTO, or other compensation details mentioned in job posting

growth_path_clarity.evidence: No career growth, advancement, or development opportunities mentioned

mentorship_signals.evidence: No mention of mentorship programs, senior staff collaboration, or learning opportunities

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No mention of promotion opportunities or career advancement paths

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No mention of internal transfers, role changes, or mobility opportunities

career_tracks_available.evidence: No career tracks, promotion paths, or advancement opportunities mentioned

requirement_strictness.evidence: Specific technical requirements (Palantir Foundry, 8-10 years exp) with locals-only restriction suggests strict requirements

scope_definition.evidence: Focused role description for Senior Data Engineer with specific technical stack and experience requirements

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: 8-10 years experience requirement aligns well with senior level title and specific technical skills mentioned
